|ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=unknown |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=SMT-R2000-WLAN0,SMT-R2000-WLAN1 |default_ssid_regex=^SMT-R2000-WLAN0$,,,^SMT-R2000-WLAN1$ |default_ip=192.168.111.10 |default_user=admin |default_pass=samsung |oui=00:00:F0,00:16:32,00:21:4C |oui_eth=00:00:F0,00:16:32,00:21:4C }} [http://www.samsungbusiness.com/business/pages/content/wi-fi.aspx Product page] :[http://www.samsung.com/ru/business/pdf/smt-r2000/manual_31223.pdf QIG]
This appears to be a access point / base station for some '''Samsung''' mobile VoIP phones.
Additional specifications, per '''Samsung''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::115 mm x 60 mm x 35 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::148 g]]
Default settings are per '''Samsung''''s manual. :'''SMT-R2000-WLAN0''' = 5GHz SSID, '''SMT-R2000-WLAN1''' = 2.4GHz SSID ::OUIs are per '''WiGLE''' data.
